title: ðŸŽ‡ WELCOMING GREETINGS FROM ALL SPEAKERS #pisc2024 #MAIPs #jal #perliscentreofwisd
transcript: Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu, my lovely brothers and sisters in Malaysia. What do we have? We would like to welcome all of you to the Perlis International Sunnah Convention titled The Light of At-Tawheed which will be held on the 27th and 28th of January 2024. Remember at day one, Mawasan 2020, Perlis, Malaysia. Perlis is a beautiful place in Malaysia. You will love the scenery, you'll love the weather, and you will love the company. In this international convention, there'll be mashayikh and da'if coming from different parts of the world. Hope to see you there so that we will get extra blessing in year 2024. Hope to see you there. Love to see you there, Inshallah. I hope to see you there, Inshallah Ta'ala. Remember the 27th and 28th of January. Please be there. Inshallah, we'll meet in Perlis on the 27th and 28th of January 2024. Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu.
